stimulusHtml: How many times will  Math.random()  be called as a result of executing this code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

double sum = 0.0;
for (int outer = 1; outer <= 4; outer++)
{
   for (int inner = 0; inner <= 4; inner++)
   {
      sum += Math.random();
   }
}
